text: Micronauts was a toy line manufactured and marketed by Mego Corporation from 1976 to 1980. Micronauts or The Micronauts may also refer to: * Micronauts (comics), based on the toy line. * The Micronauts, a French dance music act * The Micronauts, a series of unrelated novels by Gordon Williams * The Micronauts, an unmade film that film producer Harry Saltzman struggled to make throughout the 1970s * Micronaut, a side project by musician Chris Randall * Micronaut, a microservices application framework for the Java software platform
title: Micronauts (disambiguation)
